info.title: Commerce Webservices v2
info.description: These services manage all of the common commerce functionality, and also include customizations from installed AddOns.

get.summary: Retrieves the component data.
get.description:
Retrieves the CMS components using the specified identifiers. If you don't provide any component identifiers, all of the components will be retrieved. 
The components list is filtered by the specified catalog, product, or category restrictions. The result is sorted according to the sort parameter.

parameters.name: currentPage
parameters.description: Current result page. Default value is 0.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Response configuration. This is the list of fields that should be returned in the response body. Examples: BASIC, DEFAULT, FULL.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Number of results returned per page. Default value: 10.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting method applied to the return results.

parameters.name: currentPage
parameters.description: Current result page. Default value is 0.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Response configuration. This is the list of fields that should be returned in the response body. Examples: BASIC, DEFAULT, FULL.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Number of results returned per page. Default value: 10.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting method applied to the return results.

get.summary: Retrieves the component data.
get.description: Retrieves the CMS component data.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Response configuration. This is the list of fields that should be returned in the response body. Examples: BASIC, DEFAULT, FULL.

get.summary: Retrieves the page data and the CMS content slots.
get.description:
Retrieves the page data and CMS content slots using the pageLabelOrId or the code parameter. If you don't provide a value for one of these parameters, the homepage CMS content slots are retrieved. 
Content pages can be filtered using pageLabelOrId while the other page types can be filtered using the specified code.

parameters.name: code
parameters.description: Page code. Examples: homepage, electronics, cameras, 585.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Response configuration. This is the list of fields that should be returned in the response body. Examples: BASIC, DEFAULT, FULL.

parameters.name: pageLabelOrId
parameters.description:
Page Label or Id. If no page has a label that matches the page label exactly, try to find pages whose label starts with a section of the page label. Otherwise, try to find the page by id.
Note: URL encoding on the page label should be applied when the label contains special characters.

get.summary: Retrieves the page data and CMS content slots using the page identifier.
get.description: Retrieves the page data and CMS content slots, each of which contains a list of CMS component data. The page identifier is required.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Response configuration. This is the list of fields that should be returned in the response body. Examples: BASIC, DEFAULT, FULL.

get.summary: Get a list of reasons by type
get.description:
Returns a list refund, incident, and message reasons by type.
Reasons are sorted by sort index, set in Mirakl.

get.summary: Retrieves the component data.
get.description:
Retrieves the CMS components using the specified identifiers. If you don't provide any component identifiers, all of the components will be retrieved. 
The components list is filtered by the specified catalog, product, or category restrictions.The result is sorted according to the sort parameter.

parameters.name: currentPage
parameters.description: Current result page. Default value is 0.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Response configuration. This is the list of fields that should be returned in the response body. Examples: BASIC, DEFAULT, FULL.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Number of results returned per page. Default value: 10.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting method applied to the return results.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: User identifier or one of the literals : 'current' for currently authenticated user, 'anonymous' for anonymous user

get.summary: Retrieves the component data.
get.description: Retrieves the CMS component data.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Response configuration. This is the list of fields that should be returned in the response body. Examples: BASIC, DEFAULT, FULL.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: User identifier or one of the literals : 'current' for currently authenticated user, 'anonymous' for anonymous user

get.summary: Retrieves the page data and the CMS content slots.
get.description:
Retrieves the page data and CMS content slots using the pageLabelOrId or the code parameter. If you don't provide a value for one of these parameters, the homepage CMS content slots are retrieved. 
Content pages can be filtered using pageLabelOrId while the other page types can be filtered using the specified code.

parameters.name: code
parameters.description: Page code. Examples: homepage, electronics, cameras, 585.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Response configuration. This is the list of fields that should be returned in the response body. Examples: BASIC, DEFAULT, FULL.

parameters.name: pageLabelOrId
parameters.description:
Page Label or Id. If no page has a label that matches the page label exactly, try to find pages whose label starts with a section of the page label. Otherwise, try to find the page by id.
Note: URL encoding on the page label should be applied when the label contains special characters.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: User identifier or one of the literals : 'current' for currently authenticated user, 'anonymous' for anonymous user

get.summary: Retrieves the page data and CMS content slots using the page identifier.
get.description: Retrieves the page data and CMS content slots, each of which contains a list of CMS component data. The page identifier is required.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Response configuration. This is the list of fields that should be returned in the response body. Examples: BASIC, DEFAULT, FULL.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: User identifier or one of the literals : 'current' for currently authenticated user, 'anonymous' for anonymous user

parameters.description: User identifier or one of the literals : 'current' for currently authenticated user, 'anonymous' for anonymous user

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Response configuration. This is the list of fields that should be returned in the response body. Examples: BASIC,DEFAULT,FULL

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Response configuration. This is the list of fields that should be returned in the response body. Examples: BASIC,DEFAULT,FULL

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Response configuration. This is the list of fields that should be returned in the response body. Examples: BASIC,DEFAULT,FULL

parameters.name: cartId
parameters.description: Cart identifier: cart code for logged-in user, cart GUID for anonymous user, or 'current' for the last modified cart.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: User identifier or one of the literals : 'current' for currently authenticated user, 'anonymous' for anonymous user

id.description: Unique id value of the address which is optional while creating new address. While performing other address operations this value is the key

firstName.description: First name of the address person

lastName.description: Last name of the address person

shippingAddress.description: Boolean flag if address is for shipping

defaultAddress.description: Boolean flag if address is default

visibleInAddressBook.description: Boolean flag if address is visible in the Address Book

formattedAddress.description: Boolean flag if address is formatted

AlotechRequest.description: Request body parameters to retrieve an order data

kind.description: Type of message, e.g. info, warning

code.description: A unique identifier for the message

message.description: A human-readable description of the message

target.description: Reference(s) to the specific part(s) of the cart that the message pertains to

ApiMessage.description: Representation of supplementary info, warning messages, even when the business APIs successfully execute their operations.

isolated.description: Indicates whether customer data isolation is enabled for this site. If true, customer can get site information after registration, For example registerd username is name@sap.com, returned uid will be name@sap.com|baseSiteUid

BaseSiteList.description: Representation of a Base Site List

externalTaxEnabled.description: Flag defining is external tax is enabled

maxRadiusForPosSearch.description: Maximum radius for searching point of service

expressCheckoutEnabled.description: Flag specifying whether the express checkout option is enabled

enabled.description: if true, the channel is on; if false, the channel is off
Indicates if the captcha is enabled or not

publicKey.description: The public key used in captcha validation

CardTypeList.description: Representation of a Card Type List

net.description: Flag stating iv value is net-value

calculated.description: Flag showing if order is calculated

pickupOrderGroups.description: List of pickup order entry group

deliveryOrderGroups.description: List of delivery order entries group

requestedRetrievalAt.description: Customer requested date for order retrieval

sapPaymentOptionId.description: The payment option identifier. It specifies which option the consumer selected to make the payment for the cart.

potentialOrderPromotions.description: List of potential order promotions for cart

potentialProductPromotions.description: List of potential product promotions for cart

earliestRetrievalAt.description: Earliest possible retrieval date available for order

_messages.description: Messages about supplementary info, warning messages related to the cart

Cart.description: Representation of a Cart. Note that sapBillingAddress is mutually exclusive with paymentInfo.billingAddress, which is used when the billing address is created concurrently with the paymentInfo. sapBillingAddress is used when there is a need to save the billing address, but the related paymentInfo has not been created yet.

quantity.description: Total number of products to be created, added or updated during a cart modification. This value is always the quantity that has been requested.

CartModificationList.description: Representation of a Cart modification list

url.description: Url address of abstract catalog item
Url address of abstract catalog item
Url address of abstract catalog item

features.description: List of features for given classification

ConfigurationInfoList.description: Representation of a Configuration Info List

ConsentTemplateList.description: Representation of a Consent Template List

marketplaceStatusLabel.description: Reason's label of the order state

canEvaluate.description: Indicates if the order can be evaluated by the customer

canWriteMessage.description: Indicates if the customer can write a message

documents.description: All the documents available on the order

customerDebited.description: Indicates if the customer has been debited

miraklOrderLineStatusLabel.description: Reason's label of the order line's state

canOpenIncident.description: Indicate if an incident can be opened on the order line

Country.description: Response body fields which will be returned while fetching the list of countries. The DTO is in XML or .json format

countries.description: This is the list of Country fields that should be returned in the response body

isocode.description: Code of the currency in iso format

active.description: Boolean flag whether currency is active

DeliveryModeList.description: Representation of a Delivery mode list

quantity.description: Quantity of order entries in a group

marketplace.description: Set to true for marketplace products

redeemLoyaltyPoints.description: Number of loyalty points redeemed in the group

groupedAppliedPromotions.description: Grouped applied promotions in the delivery group level

loyalty.description: Set to true if the group contains only loyalty products

digital.description: Set to true for group with digital/loyalty products

DeliveryOrderEntryGroup.description: Representation of a Delivery Order Entry Group

Document.description: All the documents available on the order

quantity.description: Represents the number of items expected to arrive.

at.description: The date associated with the expected arrival slot.

accuracy.description: The accuracy of the arrival slot as estimated, or unknown.

EntryArrivalSlot.description: Records of item arrivals facilitate the tracking and management of item quantities, associated arrival times, and certainty levels. These records distinguish between guaranteed, estimated, and unknown arrival scenarios.

erroneous.description: Indicates if the entry group is in an error state

type.description: Indicates type of the group, possible values are STANDALONE, CONFIGURABLEBUNDLE or any customer implemented type for any new provider

category.description: Flag stating if facet is category facet

multiSelect.description: Flag stating if facet is multiSelect

visible.description: Flag stating if facet is visible

selected.description: Flag stating if facet value is selected

comparable.description: Flag defining it feature is comparable

formattedDate.description: Date of future stock expressed in text value

imageType.description: Type of the image, can be PRIMARY or GALLERY

format.description: Format of the image, can be zoom, product, thumbnail, store, cartIcon, etc.

altText.description: Tooltip content which is visible while image mouse hovering

galleryIndex.description: Index of the image while displayed in gallery

nativeName.description: name the language in native form

active.description: true/false indicator when the language is active

languages.description: This is the list of Language fields that should be returned in the response body

LanguageList.description: Lists all available languages (all languages used for a particular store). If the list of languages for a base store is empty, a list of all languages available in the system will be returned

net.description: Flag stating iv value is net-value

calculated.description: Flag showing if order is calculated

pickupOrderGroups.description: List of pickup order entry group

deliveryOrderGroups.description: List of delivery order entries group

requestedRetrievalAt.description: Customer requested date for order retrieval

sapPaymentOptionId.description: The payment option identifier. It specifies which option the consumer selected to make the payment for the cart.

guestCustomer.description: Flag showing if customer is Guest customer

cancellable.description: Boolean flag showing if order is cancellable

returnable.description: Boolean flag showing if order is returnable

Order.description: Representation of a order. Note that sapBillingAddress is mutually exclusive with paymentInfo.billingAddress, which is used when the billing address is created concurrently with the paymentInfo. sapBillingAddress is used when there is a need to save the billing address, but the related paymentInfo has not been created yet.

entryNumber.description: Entry number of the order entry

quantity.description: Quantity number of items in order entry

updateable.description: Flag defining if order entry item is updateable

statusSummaryList.description: List of aggregated status information per entry, relevant if the entry is configurable and its configuration contains one or many issues in different severities. Note that configurators typically raise such issues only in case the parent document is changeable. In this case the issues (depending on their severity) need to be fixed before a checkout can be done. This means this segment can be present for a cart entry, for order entries it will always be empty

cancellableQuantity.description: Quantity number of cancellable items in order entry

returnableQuantity.description: Quantity number of returnable items in order entry

shopId.description: Identifier of the shop which proposes the offer

shopName.description: Name of the shop which proposes the offer

OrderEntryList.description: Representation of an Order entry list consumed

OrderHistoryList.description: Representation of an Order History List

code.description: Code of update element of order status

OrderStatusUpdateElement.description: Representation of an Order Status Update Element

orderStatusUpdateElements.description: List of order status update elements

OrderStatusUpdateElementList.description: Representation of an Order Status Update Element List

startMonth.description: Start month from which payment is valid

startYear.description: Start year from which payment is valid

saved.description: Flag to mark if payment is saved one

defaultPayment.description: Flag to mark if payment the default one

PaymentDetailsList.description: Representation of a Payment details list

PaymentModeList.description: Representation of a Payment Mode List

quantity.description: Quantity of order entries in a group

PickupOrderEntryGroup.description: Representation of a Pickup Order Entry Group

additionalProperties.description: Map of string keys and string values

additionalPaymentParameters.description: Map of string keys and string values

name.description: Name of the point of service

displayName.description: Display name of the point of service

url.description: Url address of the point of service

description.description: Description of the point of service

storeContent.description: Store content of given point of service

additionalProperties.description: List of features for a given point of service

features.description: List of features for a given point of service

formattedDistance.description: Distance to the point of service as text value

distanceKm.description: Distance to the point of service as number value

storeImages.description: Collection of images associated with a point of service

pickUpInStoreInstructions.description: Instructions used for picking up an order in store

PointOfService.description: Representation of a Point of service

PointOfServiceList.description: Representation of a Point of Service List

name.description: Name of the point of service

displayName.description: Display name of the point of service

url.description: Url address of the point of service

description.description: Description of the point of service

storeContent.description: Store content of given point of service

additionalProperties.description: List of features for a given point of service

features.description: List of features for a given point of service

formattedDistance.description: Distance to the point of service as text value

distanceKm.description: Distance to the point of service as number value

storeImages.description: Collection of images associated with a point of service

pickUpInStoreInstructions.description: Instructions used for picking up an order in store

PointOfServiceStock.description: Representation of a Point Of Service Stock

PointOfServiceWithEntries.description: List of stores with rts stocks

value.description: Value of price in BigDecimal format

minQuantity.description: Minimum quantity of the price value

maxQuantity.description: Maximum quantity of the price value

Principal.description: Representation of a Principal webservice DTO used for defining User data types

purchasable.description: Flag defining if product is purchasable

availableForPickup.description: Flag defining if product is available for pickup

numberOfReviews.description: Number of reviews associated with the product

images.description: List of images linked to product

categories.description: List of categories product belongs to

reviews.description: List of reviews associated with the product

classifications.description: List of classifications related to the product

potentialPromotions.description: List of potential promotions related to the product

variantOptions.description: List of variant options related to the product

baseOptions.description: List of base options related to the product

volumePricesFlag.description: Flag stating if volume price should be displayed

variantMatrix.description: List of variant matrixes associated with the product

multidimensional.description: Flag stating if product is multidimensional

configuratorType.description: Configurator type related to the product

configurable.description: Flag stating if product is configurable

sapAddToCartDisabled.description: Flag specifies whether product can be added to cart. When addToCartDisabled=true, the product is not allowed to be added into cart and the reason is explained through sapAddToCartDisabledMessage; when addToCartDisabled=false, the product is allowed to be added into cart.

sapAddToCartDisabledMessage.description: Message shows why product can not be added to cart.
sapAddToCartDisabledMessage.example: 'EF-S 60mm f/2.8 USM Macro' is not available with 'EOS450D + 18-55 IS Kit'

code.description: Code of product express update element

ProductExpressUpdateElement.description: Representation of a Product Express Update Element

productExpressUpdateElements.description: List of product express update element

ProductExpressUpdateElementList.description: Representation of a Product Express Update Element List

preselected.description: Flag stating if product reference is preselected

ProductReferenceList.description: Representation of a Product Reference List

ProductSearchPage.description: Representation of a Product Search Page

startDate.description: The initial date of the promotion

endDate.description: Last date of validity of the promotion

couldFireMessages.description: Message about promotion which is displayed when planning potential promotion. This field has higher priority over promotion description

items.description: Message about promotion which is displayed when planning potential promotion. This field has higher priority over promotion description

firedMessages.description: Message fired while the promotion is active. This is info how much you will get when applying the promotion

items.description: Message fired while the promotion is active. This is info how much you will get when applying the promotion

enabled.description: Boolean flag if promotion is enabled

priority.description: Priority index as numeric value of the promotion. Higher number means higher priority

adjustedUnitPrice.description: Adjusted unit price for promotion order entry

PromotionOrderEntryConsumed.description: Representation of a Promotion order entry consumed

consumedEntries.description: List of promotion order entries consumed

PromotionResultList.description: Representation of a Promotion result list

isocode.description: Country and Region code in iso format

isocodeShort.description: Region code in short iso form

Region.description: Response body fields which will be returned while fetching the list of country's regions.

regions.description: This is the list of Region fields that should be returned in the response body

cancellable.description: Boolean flag for whether the return request is cancellable

creationTime.description: Date of the return request creation

refundDeliveryCost.description: Boolean flag for whether there is a delivery cost for refund

returnEntries.description: Entries of the return request which contains information about the returned product

ReturnRequest.description: Representation of a return request for an order

expectedQuantity.description: Quantity which is expected to be returned for this return request entry

ReturnRequestEntry.description: Representation of a return request entry which contains information about the returned product

availabilityCode.description: Code of the unit is used to check availability, which can be retrieved either from 'code' without any integration, from 'sapCode' with SAP OMSA integration, or potentially from another source through custom integration with a stock service.

SaveCartResult.description: Representation of a Save Cart Result

selected.description: Flag stating when Sort is selected

formattedDate.description: Text representation of the date of special opening day

closed.description: Flag stating if special opening day is closed

name.description: Name of the special opening day event

SpecialOpeningDay.description: Representation of a special opening day

SpellingSuggestion.description: Representation of a Spell Checker Suggestion

status.description: Status or severity indicator, can be one of ERROR, WARNING, INFO or SUCCESS

StatusSummary.description: Representation of a status summary, an aggregated view on issues for a specific status or severity. These issues are attached to configurations of products or order entries

isValueRounded.description: Indicate whether Stock level value is rounded

StoreCountList.description: Representation of a Store Count List

StoreFinderSearchPage.description: Representation of a Store finder search page

stores.description: List of stores with rts stocks

StoreFinderStockRtsSearchPage.description: Representation of a Store Finder Rts Search Page

StoreFinderStockSearchPage.description: Representation of a Store Finder Stock Search Page

hour.description: Hour part of the time data

minute.description: Minute part of the time data

defaultPointOfServiceName.description: Name of the default pick up location

lastCartId.description: The latest cart operated by customer

hasOrder.description: Indicates whether customer has order. Default value is false.

url.description: URL of customer profile image in media server. It's optional.

UserGroupList.description: Representation of a User Group List

uid.description: user id, unique string required to create new user. It can be email

verificationTokenId.description: Authentication identifier of a new B2C customer registration. Only needed when OTP for registration is enabled.

verificationTokenCode.description: Code included in the email sent to the customer to be registered. Only needed when OTP for registration is enabled.

UserSignUp.description: Representation of a UserSignUp. Consists of fields required to register a new customer

hasImage.description: Flag if varian category has image assigned

elements.description: List of elements with the type of variant matrix element

VariantMatrixElement.description: Representation of a Variant Matrix Element

url.description: Url address of the variant option

VariantOption.description: List of variant options related to the product

VariantOptionQualifier.description: Representation of a Variant Option Qualifier

name.description: Name of the variant value category

sequence.description: Sequence number of variant value category

superCategories.description: Parent category of variant value category

VariantValueCategory.description: Representation of a Variant Value Category

code.description: The identifier of the Voucher. This is the first part of voucher code which holds first 3 letters, like: 123

voucherCode.description: Voucher code, is the holder for keeping specific occasional voucher related to business usage. It can be generated and looks like: 123-H8BC-Y3D5-34AL

value.description: Value of the voucher. Example of such value is: 15.0d

valueString.description: The value of the voucher to display. Example: 15.0%

freeShipping.description: Specifies if the order this voucher is applied to is shipped for free (true) or not (false). Defaults to false.

weekDay.description: Text representation of week day opening day

closed.description: Flag stating if weekday opening day is closed

closeSoon.description: Flag stating if store is going to be closing soon

WeekdayOpeningDay.description: Representation of a Weekday Opening Day

ZoneDeliveryMode.description: Representation of a Zone Delivery Mode

pageSize.description: The number of results per page. A page may have less results if there are less than a full page of results, only on the last page in the results

currentPage.description: The current page number. The first page is number zero (0), the second page is number one (1), and so on

totalPages.description: The total number of pages. This is the number of pages, each of pageSize, required to display the totalResults.

totalResults.description: The total number of matched results across all pages

deprecatedPagination.description: Representation of a search results pagination

reason.description: Additional classification specific for each error type e.g. 'noStock'.

subjectType.description: Type of the object related to the error e.g. 'entry'.

subject.description: Identifier of the related object e.g. '1'.

value.description: the corresponding value of current channel, for example, for SMS it should be a mobile number; for email it should be an email address

enabled.description: if true, the channel is on; if false, the channel is off

visible.description: if true, the channel is visible; if false, the channel is invisible

count.description: Number of elements on this page

hasNext.description: Indicates if there is next page

hasPrevious.description: Indicates if there is previous page

notificationType.description: notification type used for this message
